article_title: Employee satisfaction at Carolinas HealthCare System dropped in 2015
article_text:

article_metadata.news-keywords: Carolinas HealthCare System, employee, engagement, concerns, staffing, benefits, working conditions, Tarwater, Karen Garloch, health, nurse, understaffing
article_metadata.description: Concerns about health benefits and staffing levels contributed to a decline in employee satisfaction at Carolinas HealthCare System this year compared to other U.S. hospitals, according to a survey conducted for the Charlotte-based hospital system.
article_metadata.title: Employee satisfaction at Carolinas HealthCare System dropped in 2015 | The Charlotte Observer
